thread.title: Marlin Apartments introduces meeting booking service | Buying Business Travel
thread.title_full: Marlin Apartments introduces meeting booking service | Buying Business Travel

title: Marlin Apartments introduces meeting booking service | Buying Business Travel
text:
Wed, 30 Sep 2015 06:00 Serviced apartment operator Marlin Apartments has unveiled a meeting space booking service for buyers.
Meeting space with presentation display technology and kitchen facilities can now be arranged through Marlin.
The company said a range of meeting space can be booked and will be located close to each of Marlin’s properties.
Marlin said as well as being the first apartment provider to be incorporated into the GDS system, Marlin also introduced a 24-hour reception, which can be used to make UK reservations.
Marlin Apartment MD Susan Cully, said: “We are delighted to announce that serviced meeting space is now bookable through Marlin at a competitive rate.
“At Marlin, we are constantly looking for ways to further benefit business buyers and travellers. Acting on the feedback we received, we aim to reduce the time buyers often spend trying to find the perfect meeting space by putting a great selection at their fingertips as a trustworthy service.”
